message.subject: new EOG well
message.content:
M1.1. FYI, Kevin
[Inform: presumably attached document is from Kevin]

message.subject: new EOG well
message.content:
M2.1. FYI...we did it!
[Inform: for Bob's information, Michelle et al. did something they are proud of]
M2.2. Over the first 6 days, they averaged over 25,000.
[Inform: over first 6 days, they averaged more than 25,000 (units of oil pumped? dollars?)]

message.subject: new EOG well
message.content:
M3.1. We will need to keep reminding them of how much money they are making when
they start to complain about the construction cost.
[Inform: Bob et al. need to remind others of how much money they are making if they complain about construction cost]
M3.2. By the time we get power
there, install the flow control equipment, and install the new EFM, we will
probably be close to $70,000.
[Inform: by the time Bob et al. get power to and install equipment and EFM for the new EOG well (presumably), they will have spent almost $70,000]
